document_data.title: Xanthoria
document_data.author:
[[Toni Winslow-Brill]]
'''Credited as developers:'''
[[Bill Benham]], [[Christopher Perkins]]
document_data.mainbody:
'''"Xanthoria"''' is a short adventure module for 16{{th}}–level players, collected in the anthology ''[[Candlekeep Mysteries]]'', where players must stop a deadly plague by defeating a mad [[lichen lich]].
{{TOC limit|2}}
document_data.Synopsis: In [[1492 DR]], a deadly plague is ravaging the [[Sword Coast]]. A group of [[adventurer]]s travel to [[Candlekeep]] to research a way to stop it, and find the tome ''[[Xanthoria (book)|Xanthoria]]''. The adventurers must travel to the [[Lykortha Expanse]] to deal with the creator of the plague, an insane [[druid]] who has undergone a horrible transformation.
